com.power.visual
Class TranslucencyEffect

java.lang.Object
  com.power.visual.AbstractWindowEffect
      com.power.visual.TranslucencyEffect
All Implemented Interfaces:
WindowEffect
Direct Known Subclasses:
FaderEffect
public class TranslucencyEffect
extends AbstractWindowEffect

Efeito visual que aplica transparência às janelas adicionadas, através da classe com.sun.awt.AWTUtilities.

Author:
Juno Roesler - juno.rr@gmail.com
See Also:
AbstractWindowEffect
